info.title: ConvertAPI
info.description: The ConvertAPI provides online API for creating PDF and Images from various sources like Word document, web pages or raw HTML codes. In just few minutes you can integrate it into your application and use it easily. Return to APIs list.

post.description: The API for converting E-Mail files to PDF files and Images. These file formats eml, mbx, msg, oft can be converted to png, jpg, tif.

parameters.name: ApiKey
parameters.description: API Key should be passed if you purchased membership with credits. Please login to your control panel to find out your API Key http://www.convertapi.com/a

parameters.name: File
parameters.description: Supported source file formats: eml, mbx, msg, oft

parameters.name: ImageResolutionH
parameters.description: Image horizontal resolution (DPI).

parameters.name: ImageResolutionV
parameters.description: Image vertical resolution (DPI).

parameters.name: JpgQuality
parameters.description: Jpg image quality.

parameters.name: OutputFormat
parameters.description: Supported output file formats png, jpg, tif. If output format is set to png or jpg a image file will be created for every converted document page and returned as zip file.

parameters.name: StoreFile
parameters.description: Store file on server and return url to file instead of file stream response. File will be available for 24 hours.

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: Conversion timeout in seconds.

post.description: The API for converting E-Mail files to PDF files and Images. These file formats eml, mbx, msg, oft can be converted to pdf, pdfa, png, jpg, tif.

parameters.name: ApiKey
parameters.description: API Key should be passed if you purchased membership with credits. Please login to your control panel to find out your API Key http://www.convertapi.com/a

parameters.name: DocumentAuthor
parameters.description: Set the author of the generated Pdf file. If value is not set a source document author is used instead.

parameters.name: DocumentKeywords
parameters.description: Set the keywords of the generated Pdf file. If value is not set a source document keywords is used instead.

parameters.name: DocumentSubject
parameters.description: Set the subject of the generated Pdf file. If value is not set a source document subject is used instead.

parameters.name: DocumentTitle
parameters.description: Set the title of the generated Pdf file. If value is not set a source document title is used instead.

parameters.name: File
parameters.description: Supported source file formats: eml, mbx, msg, oft

parameters.name: OutputFormat
parameters.description: Supported output file formats pdf, pdfa, png, jpg, tif. If output format is set to png or jpg a image file will be created for every converted document page and returned as zip file.

parameters.name: StoreFile
parameters.description: Store file on server and return url to file instead of file stream response. File will be available for 24 hours.

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: Conversion timeout in seconds.

post.description: The API for converting Excel documents to PDF files and Images. These file formats csv, xls, xlsb, xlsx, xlt, xltx can be converted to png, jpg, tif.

parameters.name: AlternativeParser
parameters.description: If some objects are missing in converted Pdf files from original source files this option can be enabled to improve conversion. The option process files much slower and should be disabled by default.

parameters.name: ApiKey
parameters.description: API Key should be passed if you purchased membership with credits. Please login to your control panel to find out your API Key http://www.convertapi.com/a

parameters.name: File
parameters.description: Supported source file formats: csv, xls, xlsb, xlsx, xlt, xltx

parameters.name: ImageResolutionH
parameters.description: Image horizontal resolution (DPI).

parameters.name: ImageResolutionV
parameters.description: Image vertical resolution (DPI).

parameters.name: JpgQuality
parameters.description: Jpg image quality.

parameters.name: OutputFormat
parameters.description: Supported output file formats png, jpg, tif. If output format is set to png or jpg a image file will be created for every converted document page and returned as zip file.

parameters.name: StoreFile
parameters.description: Store file on server and return url to file instead of file stream response. File will be available for 24 hours.

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: Conversion timeout in seconds.

parameters.name: WorksheetActive
parameters.description: Set to convert active worksheet. If value is not set all worksheet will be converted.

parameters.name: WorksheetIndex
parameters.description: Set worksheet index(number) to convert. If value is not set all worksheet will be converted.

parameters.name: WorksheetName
parameters.description: Set worksheet name to convert. If value is not set all worksheet will be converted.

post.description: The API for converting Image files to PDF files and Images. These file formats avs, bmp, dcx, dib, dpx, fax, fits, fpx, gif, ico, iptc, jbig, jp2, jpeg, jpg, mdi, miff, mng, mpc, mtv, otb, pbm, pcd, pcds, pct, pcx, pgm, pict, png, pnm, ppm, psd, p7, ras, rgba, sun, tga, tiff, tif, vicar, vid, viff, wmf, xbm, xpm, xwd can be converted to png, jpg, tif.

parameters.name: ApiKey
parameters.description: API Key should be passed if you purchased membership with credits. Please login to your control panel to find out your API Key http://www.convertapi.com/a

parameters.name: File
parameters.description: Supported source file formats: avs, bmp, dcx, dib, dpx, fax, fits, fpx, gif, ico, iptc, jbig, jp2, jpeg, jpg, mdi, miff, mng, mpc, mtv, otb, pbm, pcd, pcds, pct, pcx, pgm, pict, png, pnm, ppm, psd, p7, ras, rgba, sun, tga, tiff, tif, vicar, vid, viff, wmf, xbm, xpm, xwd

parameters.name: ImageResolutionH
parameters.description: Image horizontal resolution (DPI).

parameters.name: ImageResolutionV
parameters.description: Image vertical resolution (DPI).

parameters.name: JpgQuality
parameters.description: Jpg image quality.

parameters.name: OutputFormat
parameters.description: Supported output file formats png, jpg, tif. If output format is set to png or jpg a image file will be created for every converted document page and returned as zip file.

parameters.name: StoreFile
parameters.description: Store file on server and return url to file instead of file stream response. File will be available for 24 hours.

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: Conversion timeout in seconds.

parameters.description: Set the author of the generated Pdf file. If value is not set a source document author is used instead.

parameters.name: DocumentKeywords
parameters.description: Set the keywords of the generated Pdf file. If value is not set a source document keywords is used instead.

parameters.name: DocumentSubject
parameters.description: Set the subject of the generated Pdf file. If value is not set a source document subject is used instead.

parameters.name: DocumentTitle
parameters.description: Set the title of the generated Pdf file. If value is not set a source document title is used instead.

parameters.name: File
parameters.description: Supported source file formats: mpp, mpt

parameters.name: OutputFormat
parameters.description: Supported output file formats pdf, pdfa, png, jpg, tif. If output format is set to png or jpg a image file will be created for every converted document page and returned as zip file.

parameters.name: StoreFile
parameters.description: Store file on server and return url to file instead of file stream response. File will be available for 24 hours.

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: Conversion timeout in seconds.

post.description: The API for converting Web Pages to Images.

parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: Set accept language header.

parameters.name: AlternativeParser
parameters.description: Set alternative parser. You should test both parsers and choose which to use depending on conversion quality.

parameters.name: ApiKey
parameters.description: API Key should be passed if you purchased membership with credits. Please login to your control panel to find out your API Key http://www.convertapi.com/a

parameters.name: AuthPassword
parameters.description: HTTP Authentication password, used if conversion web page is protected with HTTP authentication.

parameters.name: AuthUsername
parameters.description: HTTP authentication username, used if conversion web page is protected with HTTP authentication.

parameters.name: ConversionDelay
parameters.description: Delay in seconds before page load and PDF creation. Sometimes usefull to let web page to load in full.

parameters.name: CUrl
parameters.description: URI of a web page to convert. Must start with http:// or https://. Several URI of web pages merged with %20 (space) symbol can be passed to create one PDF. For example if http://www.google.com%20http://www.nytimes.com URI will be passed the two web pages will be merged into one PDF. If URI has special characters like ? or &amp; they must be encoded. Also a HTML code can be submitted for conversion using this parameter.

parameters.name: PageHeight
parameters.description: Set screen height. Default is calculated from page content.

parameters.name: PageWidth
parameters.description: Set screen width.

parameters.name: Plugins
parameters.description: Enable plugins such as flash.

parameters.name: Scripts
parameters.description: Allow web pages to run javascript.

parameters.name: StoreFile
parameters.description: Store file on server and return url to file instead of file stream response. File will be available for 24 hours.

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: Conversion timeout in seconds.

parameters.name: UserAgent
parameters.description: Set custom user agent.

post.description: The API for converting Web Pages to PDF files.

parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: Set accept language header.

parameters.name: AlternativeParser
parameters.description: Set alternative parser. You should test both parsers and choose which to use depending on conversion quality.

parameters.name: ApiKey
parameters.description: API Key should be passed if you purchased membership with credits. Please login to your control panel to find out your API Key http://www.convertapi.com/a

parameters.name: AuthPassword
parameters.description: HTTP Authentication password, used if conversion web page is protected with HTTP authentication.

parameters.name: AuthUsername
parameters.description: HTTP authentication username, used if conversion web page is protected with HTTP authentication.

parameters.name: Background
parameters.description: Print web page background.

parameters.name: ConversionDelay
parameters.description: Delay in seconds before page load and PDF creation. Sometimes usefull to let web page to load in full.

parameters.name: CoverUrl
parameters.description: Use html document as cover. It will be inserted before the toc with no headers and footers.

parameters.name: CUrl
parameters.description: URI of a web page to convert. Must start with http:// or https://. Several URI of web pages merged with %20 (space) symbol can be passed to create one PDF. For example if http://www.google.com%20http://www.nytimes.com URI will be passed the two web pages will be merged into one PDF. If URI has special characters like ? or &amp; they must be encoded. Also a HTML code can be submitted for conversion using this parameter.

parameters.name: DocumentTitle
parameters.description: Set the title of the generated pdf file. If value is not set a html page title is used instead.

parameters.name: FooterLine
parameters.description: Display line above the footer.

parameters.name: FooterSpacing
parameters.description: Spacing between footer and content. Header spacing can be specified in millimeters (mm), inches (in) or centimeters (cm). If no units are specified, millimeters are assumed.

parameters.name: FooterTextCenter
parameters.description: Center aligned footer text.

parameters.name: FooterTextFont
parameters.description: Set footer font name.

parameters.name: FooterTextLeft
parameters.description: Left aligned footer text.

parameters.name: FooterTextRight
parameters.description: Right aligned footer text.

parameters.name: FooterTextSize
parameters.description: Set footer font size.

parameters.name: FooterUrl
parameters.description: Adds a html footer. This can be either a URI or HTML code.

parameters.name: HeaderLine
parameters.description: Display line below the header.

parameters.name: HeaderSpacing
parameters.description: Spacing between header and content. Header spacing can be specified in millimeters (mm), inches (in) or centimeters (cm). If no units are specified, millimeters are assumed.

parameters.name: HeaderTextCenter
parameters.description: Center aligned header text.

parameters.name: HeaderTextFont
parameters.description: Set header font name.

parameters.name: HeaderTextLeft
parameters.description: Left aligned header text.

parameters.name: HeaderTextRight
parameters.description: Right aligned header text.

parameters.name: HeaderTextSize
parameters.description: Set header font size.

parameters.name: HeaderUrl
parameters.description: Adds a html header. This can be either a URI or HTML code. This and others header and footer properties support these smart tags. [page] - Replaced by the number of the pages currently being printed. [frompage] - Replaced by the number of the first page to be printed. [topage] - Replaced by the number of the last page to be printed. [webpage] - Replaced by the URL of the page being printed. [section] - Replaced by the name of the current section. [subsection] - Replaced by the name of the curren

parameters.name: InfoStamp
parameters.description: Show date stamp and conversion url in header.

parameters.name: LowQuality
parameters.description: Generates lower quality PDF, makes smaller file size.

parameters.name: MarginBottom
parameters.description: Set the page bottom margin. Margins can be specified in millimeters (mm), inches (in) or centimeters (cm). If no units are specified, millimeters are assumed.

parameters.name: MarginLeft
parameters.description: Set the page left margin. Margins can be specified in millimeters (mm), inches (in) or centimeters (cm). If no units are specified, millimeters are assumed.

parameters.name: MarginRight
parameters.description: Set the page right margin. Margins can be specified in millimeters (mm), inches (in) or centimeters (cm). If no units are specified, millimeters are assumed.

parameters.name: MarginTop
parameters.description: Set the page top margin. Margins can be specified in millimeters (mm), inches (in) or centimeters (cm). If no units are specified, millimeters are assumed.

parameters.name: Outline
parameters.description: Show outline in PDF file.

parameters.name: PageHeight
parameters.description: Custom page height. Custom page size can be specified in millimeters (mm), inches (in) or centimeters (cm). If no units are specified, millimeters are assumed. This option override PageSize option.

parameters.name: PageNo
parameters.description: Show page number in footer.

parameters.name: PageOrientation
parameters.description: PDF page orientation: portrait, landscape

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: PDF page paper sizes.: a0, a1, a2, a3, a4, a5, a6, a7, a8, a9, b0, b1, b2, b3, b4, b5, letter, legal, ledger

parameters.name: PageWidth
parameters.description: Custom page width. Custom page size can be specified in millimeters (mm), inches (in) or centimeters (cm). If no units are specified, millimeters are assumed. This option override PageSize option.

parameters.name: Plugins
parameters.description: Enable plugins such as flash.

parameters.name: PrintType
parameters.description: Use print media-type(print css sheet) instead of screen.

parameters.name: Scripts
parameters.description: Allow web pages to run javascript.

parameters.name: StoreFile
parameters.description: Store file on server and return url to file instead of file stream response. File will be available for 24 hours.

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: Conversion timeout in seconds.

parameters.name: UserAgent
parameters.description: Set custom user agent.
